title: Fix task selection workflow and improve date field formatting

requirements.text: Fix the task selection workflow so that items checked under 'Select Tasks to Include' during case creation properly appear in 'Remaining Tasks' on the case card with unchecked checkboxes ready to be completed

quotes: Each item you check under "Select Tasks to Include" when creating the case should appear on the Remaining Tasks as an open check box that still needs to be done

acceptanceCriteria: When creating a case, checking a task under 'Select Tasks to Include' adds it to the case's task list
The case card displays all selected tasks as unchecked checkboxes under 'Remaining Tasks'
Only tasks that were checked during creation appear in 'Remaining Tasks'
Tasks can be checked off individually to mark them as complete

requirements.text: Implement task checkboxes with correct default states during case creation: Discharge Notes (checked by default), pDVM Notified (checked by default), Labs (unchecked by default), Histo (unchecked by default), Surgery Report (unchecked by default), Imaging (unchecked by default), Culture (unchecked by default)
acceptanceCriteria: The case creation form displays all seven task checkboxes
Discharge Notes checkbox is checked by default
pDVM Notified checkbox is checked by default
Labs, Histo, Surgery Report, Imaging, and Culture checkboxes are unchecked by default
Users can toggle any checkbox before creating the case

requirements.text: Format all date input fields to use month/day/year format (MM/DD/YYYY) and implement auto-advance behavior that automatically moves focus to the next input field when the current date field is completed

quotes: change date fields to set format month/day/year and auto advance to next from one to the next

acceptanceCriteria: All date fields display and accept dates in MM/DD/YYYY format
When a user completes entering a date (8 digits entered), focus automatically advances to the next form field
Date validation ensures proper month/day/year format
The auto-advance behavior works smoothly without disrupting user input

constraints: Maintain the existing CompletedTasks data structure in the backend
Preserve the ChecklistEditor component's dual-mode functionality (creation vs. completion)
Keep the existing case card layout and styling consistent
nonGoals: Adding new task types beyond the seven specified
Changing the backend data model for cases
Modifying the authentication or profile setup flow
